â€œStandard-sounding pop melodies and rocker licks, occasionally peppered with a funny rhyme or an amusing idea...while Gettin' the Band Back Together' isn't exactly a classic on paper, on stage it's directed by musical comedy master John Rando...And never underestimate the power of a charismatic cast when each and every one looks like they're having a ball...But the more inspired moments are outnumbered by limp one-liners."
